name: Droppy Color Balls
description:
Droppy Color Balls is fun crazy game. Droppy Color Balls is very addictive casual game to play. In Droppy Color Balls, color pigment balls are dropping and you need to collect at floor with same color. To collect same colored balls you need to tap on left or right of your mobile screen. By tapping you will adjust the color line at floor to catch the dropping pigments.

Enjoy this addictive game. Key to get maximum score are Focus and Concentration.
